content: Perhaps that’s because 4 senators from California and New York represent about 20% of the US population. We’re aware that you guys hate the Constitution when out of power and…well, you still hate it when in power but you at least want the minority to follow it. If you want more power and perhaps the ability to change the governing document you despise so much, elect more people in local and state elections in a broader area of land. Oh that’s right, the country is a massive sea of red for every election except presidential because you don’t want to move away from California and the Northeast. Guess you have to play by the rules as written just like everyone else. Hope you enjoy federal judges actually applying the law instead of bowing to the left’s demands and writing laws for the next few decades.
